entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 30
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 17
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 50
